story.overall_description: The video series documents the end-to-end workflow of a professional woodworker in a distinctive workshop with stone paver flooring and masonry walls. The narrative progresses from rough sanding of wooden frames using power drills and orbital sanders to detailed hand-finishing of ornate furniture, followed by the mixing and application of varnish in a spray booth, and finally the inspection of finished panels. The environment is populated by a black shop dog and contains specific industrial assets and chemical brands.

cross_clip_threats.title: High-Confidence Geolocation via Infrastructure and Supply Chain
cross_clip_threats.why_amplified_across_clips: The unique workshop interior (stone paver flooring seen in Clips 2 & 5, rough stone walls in Clip 4) creates a visual fingerprint. This is compounded by the presence of specific Italian chemical brands ('Chimital', 'TEDA') in Clip 4, which strongly suggests a location in Italy or a region heavily importing Italian woodworking supplies.
cross_clip_threats.evidence_summary: Stone paver flooring + Italian chemical brands (Chimital) + TEDA logo on shirt.
mitigation_ideas: avoid wide shots of distinctive flooring/walls

cross_clip_threats.title: Re-identification via Attire and Shop Pet
cross_clip_threats.why_amplified_across_clips: The wearer is linked across the timeline by consistent attire (blue sneakers with white soles, grey/blue shorts) and the recurring presence of a black shop dog (Clips 2 & 5). This confirms that the sanding, spraying, and sawing are all performed by the same individual.
cross_clip_threats.evidence_summary: Blue sneakers (Clips 1, 5) + Black dog (Clips 2, 5) + Consistent shorts.

cross_clip_threats.title: Comprehensive Asset and Skill Profiling
cross_clip_threats.why_amplified_across_clips: The cumulative footage acts as a full inventory of the workshop's capabilities: from handheld improvisation (drill sander) to industrial machinery (sliding table saw, spray booth). It also reveals the specific techniques and finish recipes used, which could be proprietary.
cross_clip_threats.evidence_summary: Inventory of power tools + Spray gun model + Chemical mixing ratios + Table saw model.
mitigation_ideas: avoid filming mixing ratios and equipment models

clips.scene_summary: A close-up egocentric view of a woodworking task. The wearer stands at a work table sanding a square wooden frame with a mesh insert, rotating the frame periodically to access different edges.

detections.detected_visual: Power drill with red sanding attachment
detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Reveals specific tools and assets owned or used by the wearer. The condition of the tool (worn, dusty) implies regular heavy use.
detections.evidence_rationale: Drill is the central focus of the clip.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Visual attributes that allow for re-identification of the person within the video series.
detections.evidence_rationale: Torso and arms visible throughout the activity.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Contextual information that defines the setting as a workshop. While generic, the specific layout of shelves and clutter could re-identify the specific shop to someone familiar with it.
detections.evidence_rationale: Background visible when wearer moves the frame.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Clothing item that contributes to the wearer's visual profile for re-identification.
detections.evidence_rationale: Feet visible when the wearer looks down/steps back.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Reveals the nature of the project (possibly cabinet making, window screening, or beekeeping equipment).
detections.evidence_rationale: The object being worked on is clearly visible.

clips.scene_summary: The wearer walks across the workshop, revealing stone paver flooring. They open a cabinet to retrieve a sanding disc, then move to a workbench to attach it to a pneumatic orbital sander before sanding a dark, curved wooden furniture piece.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: A unique 'living asset' that significantly narrows down the location. It suggests a less regulated or owner-operated workshop environment.
detections.evidence_rationale: Medium-sized black dog walks past the camera.

detections.detected_visual: Supply cabinet with branded boxes (e.g., sanding discs)
detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Reveals supplier preferences and inventory organization. Text on boxes is partially legible.
detections.evidence_rationale: Wearer opens white cabinet doors to access supplies.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Highly distinctive flooring material (rough-hewn stone tiles) that is atypical for modern industrial workshops, aiding in specific location fingerprinting.
detections.evidence_rationale: Camera looks down at feet walking across the floor.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Reveals professional tooling assets. The specific model and the act of changing the pad demonstrate professional trade practices.
detections.evidence_rationale: Close up of hand attaching a new sanding disc to the machine.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Shows a specific client project or product line, distinct from the light frame in the previous clip.
detections.evidence_rationale: Wearer begins sanding a dark, ornate wooden piece.

clips.scene_summary: The wearer uses a handheld sanding block and a folded piece of sandpaper to manually smooth the intricate curves and interior edges of a dark-stained wooden frame. The camera angle is close-up, focusing intensely on the hands and the workpiece.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: A unique object that could be recognized by its owner or a buyer. Its specific shape (oval/curved) distinguishes it from standard stock.
detections.evidence_rationale: Object is the primary focus of the entire clip.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Demonstrates specific craftsmanship skill and patience. While not highly sensitive, it contributes to the professional profile of the user.
detections.evidence_rationale: Continuous shot of hands using sandpaper.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Reveals consumable brand preferences (e.g., 3M or similar sanding sponges).
detections.evidence_rationale: Specific color and texture of the sanding block.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Reconfirms the specific location fingerprint established in Clip 2.
detections.evidence_rationale: Floor visible in background/periphery.

clips.scene_summary: The wearer prepares a spray gun for varnishing. They mix chemicals from metal cans into the gun's cup, walk to a ventilated spray booth area with a turntable, and proceed to spray a clear finish onto a light wooden panel.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Professional equipment that indicates the specific trade (finishing/painting).
detections.evidence_rationale: Wearer is holding and assembling the spray gun.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Logo on clothing ('TEDA') combined with the work context suggests this might be a company uniform or a promotional item from a supplier, potentially identifying the employer or key business partners.
detections.evidence_rationale: Logo clearly visible on the white t-shirt when the wearer looks down.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Specific brand names of industrial coatings. 'Chimital' is an Italian chemical company. This provides a strong geolocation clue (Italy or a region importing Italian wood finishes).
detections.evidence_rationale: Labels on metal cans used for mixing.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Reveals the facility's capability and infrastructure. The specific type of booth (dry filter vs water curtain) and the turntable setup characterize the workshop's scale.
detections.evidence_rationale: Wearer places wood on a metal turntable in a designated spraying area.

clips.scene_summary: The wearer moves a large, light-colored wooden panel from a sliding table saw to a work table. They inspect the panel's surface, possibly checking for smoothness or finish quality. A black dog is seen resting on the floor nearby.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: A large, expensive piece of industrial machinery. Its make and model (partially visible) can indicate the shop's capital investment and capabilities.
detections.evidence_rationale: Large machine used to cut/move the panel.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Re-identifies the location as the same workshop from Clip 2. The dog's presence is a unique social/environmental marker.
detections.evidence_rationale: Dog lying on the floor near the machine.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Confirms the identity of the wearer across clips.
detections.evidence_rationale: Feet visible while walking around the machine.

detections.why_privacy_sensitive: Shows the output of the work. High-quality finish implies professional skill.
detections.evidence_rationale: Wearer inspects the surface of the panel.

meta.generation_notes: The final clip ties the narrative together by showing the inspection of the work and re-confirming the location and identity markers (dog, shoes, floor). The Italian product labels in Clip 4 were the most significant new finding in this batch.
